statements: SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory
SELECT product_name, current_stock, last_reorder_date FROM inventory
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory ORDER BY current_stock DESC
SELECT product_name, current_stock, reorder_level FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, last_reorder_date FROM inventory WHERE last_reorder_date IS NOT NULL AND next_reorder_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > reorder_level AND last_reorder_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_reorder_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, next_reorder_date FROM inventory WHERE next_reorder_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT product_name, current_stock, next_reorder_date FROM inventory WHERE current_stock + 10 >= reorder_level;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, order_date FROM orders JOIN inventory ON orders.product_id = inventory.product_id;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level ORDER BY current_stock ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, reorder_level FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > 50 OR reorder_level < 10 ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, order_date FROM inventory JOIN orders ON inventory.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE orders.quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, order_date FROM orders JOIN inventory ON orders.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE orders.quantity < current_stock ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level;
SELECT id, sale_quantity, sale_date FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock > 0 ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_name, order_quantity, order_date FROM Orders WHERE order_quantity < 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock > 0 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE reorder_level > current_stock ORDER BY current_stock ASC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_quantity) AS total_sales FROM Inventory JOIN Sales ON Inventory.id = Sales.product_id GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT product_name, order_quantity, order_date FROM Inventory JOIN Orders ON Inventory.id = Orders.product_id WHERE order_quantity > 50 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < 10 AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE Inventory.id = Orders.product_id);
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < 10;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_name, current_stock, reorder_level FROM inventory WHERE current_stock <= reorder_level;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, reorder_level FROM inventory WHERE current_stock > reorder_level ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_level ORDER BY current_stock DESC
SELECT product_name, current_stock, reorder_level, purchase_date FROM inventory JOIN purchases ON inventory.id = purchases.product_id WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold AS sold_units FROM inventory JOIN sales ON inventory.id = sales.product_id WHERE quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC
SELECT product_name, reorder_threshold FROM inventory JOIN reordering_rules ON inventory.id = reordering_rules.product_id WHERE reorder_threshold <= 20 ORDER BY reorder_threshold ASC
SELECT * FROM stock_levels WHERE current_quantity > 100
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_details WHERE vendor_id = 5
SELECT sku_id, change_date FROM stock_history ORDER BY change_date DESC
SELECT * FROM reorder_rules WHERE min_threshold < 10 AND vendor_id = 2
SELECT sku_id, quantity, order_date FROM pending_orders WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY order_date
SELECT * FROM stock_levels WHERE current_quantity > min_quantity_threshold;
SELECT sku_id, product_name, category FROM product_details WHERE vendor_id = 3 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT sku_id, quantity_changed, change_date FROM stock_history WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT sku_id, reorder_quantity, vendor_id FROM reorder_rules WHERE min_threshold < 10 AND max_threshold > 20;
SELECT * FROM pending_orders WHERE vendor_id = 1 AND order_date >= '2022-08-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
